name: Furry UwU
description:
Furry UwU is an incredibly addictive game in which you have to solve simple puzzles with cute furry boys and girls.
Cute and incredibly entertaining game with simple puzzles, relaxing music and gentle atmosphere will help you relax after a hard day in the company of furry friends.
Enjoy 9 levels, solve puzzles, each one unique and challenging, and whose solution will give you a new exhibit in your personal gallery.
The game may contain shocking or offensive material and is not suitable for children or those easily disturbed.
